Hi all,

On my blog I have written a tutorial-style entry on how Marc Hadle=
y's
WADL (Web Application Description Language) together with my "REST
Desc=
ribe & Compile" can be used to generate client code in PHP5, Java,
Python, =
and Ruby. The example uses Yahoo's Inbound Links API. Both the
generated co=
de (PHP 5 in the tutorial) and the application can be
tried out directly on=
 the page.

http://blog.tomayac.de/index.php?date=3D2007-06-14&time=3D15:06=
:52&perma=3DREST+Describe+%26+Comp.html

What do you think? Looking forward=
 to hearing back from you.

Cheers,
Tom

I have used:

l
